A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am so torn with this movie. I definitely cant give it 5 stars\, its just meh for me. 
Lets go with the positives first
The best part of the movie is Rey and Kylo.  
I like them both individually and I like the chemistry they bring together. Their scenes were really the best part of the movie

Things I am on the fence with
Luke- I get it. You wanted him to be jaded.  But you took away everything about Luke that made him Luke.  A boy who felt that his dad had redemption in him after he tried to kill him but he didn't see that in Kylo? What had he scene before to think that way? 
He abandons everyone he loves?  He doesn't go after Snoke... ever? Why?  

Snoke- Who is he ? Why is he so powerful.  

Hated:
Finn/Rose storyline... So stupid and boring.  Doesn't add anything

Where does the story go?  I don't feel like the story has anywhere to go.  They kill off Snoke and now its Kylo?  Kylo doesn't scare me.  Its obvious with his connection with Rey there is some light in him.  

Too many Plot holes
